keyword: how many calories in sweet tea
title: How Many Calories in Sweet Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in sweet tea per 8 oz serving, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts, plus tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Sweet Tea?
assumptions: Brewed black tea sweetened with granulated sugar; standard Southern-style recipe, about 2 tbsp sugar per 8 oz serving; no milk or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar amount, tea strength, brand, and recipe. Homemade vs. bottled differs; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz serving of sweet tea contains about 90 calories, primarily from added sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use half the sugar (1 tbsp per serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of sweet tea?
faqs.a: About 90 calories in an 8 oz glass, depending on sugar added.

faqs.q: Is sweet tea high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, an 8 oz serving has around 23 g of sugars from added sweetener.

faqs.q: What's the difference between sweet tea and iced tea?
faqs.a: Sweet tea includes added sugar (90 kcal per 8 oz), while plain iced tea has nearly 0 calories.

faqs.q: How many carbs in sweet tea?
faqs.a: Approximately 23 g of carbs per 8 oz serving, all from sugars.

faqs.q: Does bottled sweet tea have more calories?
faqs.a: Bottled versions can vary; some have 100-150 kcal per 8 oz due to extra sugar or flavors.
